PAPER_TITLE: Deep reinforcement learning for efficient exploration of combinatorial structural design spaces
AUTHOR_NAMES: Chloe S.H. Hong, Keith J. Lee, Caitlin T. Mueller
BRIEF_DESCRIPTION_OF_YOUR_RESEARCH_CONTR: Deep reinforcement learning framework for automated structural design achieving significant efficiency improvements over traditional methods
FULL_ABSTRACT_TEXT_HERE: Traditional structural design relies heavily on human expertise and iterative optimization processes. We introduce TrussFrame-RL, a deep reinforcement learning framework that automates the design of truss structures by learning optimal placement policies through interaction with a physics-based environment...
BIBTEX_AUTHORS: Hong, Chloe S.H. and Lee, Keith J. and Mueller, Caitlin T.
CONFERENCE_OR_JOURNAL_NAME: International Association for Shell and Spatial Structures
VIDEO_DESCRIPTION: Overview of our deep reinforcement learning approach for truss frame design
IMAGE_1_DESCRIPTION: Reinforcement learning agent exploring design space
IMAGE_2_DESCRIPTION: Comparison of optimized vs traditional designs
IMAGE_3_DESCRIPTION: Performance metrics across different loading conditions
